name: Beef Cheese Burger
title: A Juicy Delight with Every Bite
description: Sink your teeth into our classic Beef Cheese Burger, made with a juicy beef patty, melted cheddar cheese, and fresh toppings, all tucked into a toasted sesame seed bun. Perfectly satisfying for burger enthusiasts!

name: Mixed Salad
title: A Fresh and Healthy Choice
description: Enjoy a vibrant bowl of mixed salad, featuring fresh greens, crisp vegetables, and a light vinaigrette. Perfect as a starter or a healthy main course.

name: Chicken Spaghetti
title: A Comforting Classic with a Twist
description: Delicious spaghetti topped with tender chicken pieces and a rich tomato-based sauce, perfectly seasoned with herbs and spices. A heartwarming meal for pasta lovers.

name: Cheesy Pizza
title: An Irresistible Cheese Lover's Delight
description: A classic pizza loaded with a rich blend of melted cheeses on a crispy crust, topped with a sprinkle of herbs for an extra burst of flavor. Perfect for cheese enthusiasts!
